tuv.seg: 100 top job interview questions - be prepared for the interview
面试中最有可能会被问到的一百道问题
While there are as many different possible interview questions as there are interviewers, it always helps to be ready for anything.
因为有许多不一样的面试官，所以他们在面试时会问到的问题也是各不相同。在面试之前能够有所准备总是会有帮助的。
Which is why we've taken the time to prepare this list of 100 potential interview questions.
在这里我们列举了100道最有可能会被问到的面试问题。
Will you face them all?
你会被问到全部的问题？
We pray no interviewer would be that cruel.
希望面试官不要这么严苛。
Will you face a few?
你会被问到一点点？
Probably.
这也是有可能的。
Will you be well-served by being ready even if you're not asked these exact questions?
即使没有问到以下确切的问题，你也能准备好应对吗？
Absolutely.
那是必须的。
Basic interview questions:
基本的面试问题
Tell me about yourself.
介绍自己
What are your strengths?
你有哪些强项？
What are your weaknesses?
你有哪些弱点？
Why do you want this job?
为什么你想应聘这个工作？
Where would you like to be in your career five years from now?
五年之后在你的职业生涯中你希望自己能走多远？
What's your ideal company?
你理想的公司是什么样的？
What attracted you to this company?
这家公司吸引你的地方是什么？
Why should we hire you?
为什么我们要选择你？
What did you like least about your last job?
关于上一份工作，你最不喜欢什么？
When were you most satisfied in your job?
你什么时候对自己的工作最为满意？
What can you do for us that other candidates can't?
相比于其他面试者，你能带给我们什么不一样的东西？
What were the responsibilities of your last position?
你上一份工作的工作职责是什么？
Why are you leaving your present job?
为什么要离开你现在的工作岗位？
What do you know about this industry?
你对于这个行业有什么样的了解？
What do you know about our company?
你对我们公司有什么了解？
Are you willing to relocate?
你能接受公司调度吗？
Do you have any questions for me?
你有什么要问我的问题吗？
Behavioral interview questions:
行为面试问题
What was the last project you led, and what was its outcome?
你领导的上个项目是什么，结果如何？
Give me an example of a time that you felt you went above and beyond the call of duty at work.
举例说明你有完成超越工作职责范围以外任务的能力。
Can you describe a time when your work was criticized?
你能描述一次工作时被批评的经历吗？
Have you ever been on a team where someone was not pulling their own weight? How did you handle it?
你的团队中是否有人滥竽充数，如果有，你是怎么处理的？
Tell me about a time when you had to give someone difficult feedback. How did you handle it?
描述你曾经必须向人寻求帮助时，你的处理经验。
What is your greatest failure, and what did you learn from it?
你做过最失败的事情是什么？你从中学到了什么？
How do you handle working with people who annoy you?
其他人做过惹怒你的事情是什么？你是如何处理的？
If I were your supervisor and asked you to do something that you disagreed with, what would you do?
假如我是你的主管，要求你做一些你不同意的事情，你会怎么做？
What was the most difficult period in your life, and how did you deal with it?
你遇到的最为艰难的时期是什么时候，你是如何渡过难关的？
Give me an example of a time you did something wrong. How did you handle it?
举例描述你做错事情的经历，你是如何处理的？
Tell me about a time where you had to deal with conflict on the job.
告诉我你是怎样处理工作上的纠纷？
If you were at a business lunch and you ordered a rare steak and they brought it to you well done, what would you do?
在一次商务会餐上，你点了一份生牛排，但是端上来的确实全熟的，你会怎么做？
If you found out your company was doing something against the law, like fraud, what would you do?
假如你发现你所在的公司在做违法的事情，比如诈骗，你会怎么做？
What assignment was too difficult for you, and how did you resolve the issue?
过去你遇到对你来说难以处理的任务是什么？你是怎么解决这个问题的？
What's the most difficult decision you've made in the last two years and how did you come to that decision?
在过去两年间，最让你难以抉择的事情是什么？你是如何做出决定的？
Describe how you would handle a situation if you were required to finish multiple tasks by the end of the day, and there was no conceivable way that you could finish them.
假设你在一天之中有很多项任务需要完成，但是全部完成这些任务是不可能的，你会怎么做？
Salary questions:
关于薪水的问题
What salary are you seeking?
你期望的薪资是多少？
What's your salary history?
你以往的薪资水平如何？
If I were to give you this salary you requested but let you write your job description for the next year, what would it say?
如果我给你你期望的薪水，但是请你写出你明年的工作安排****
Career development questions:
职业发展上的问题
What are you looking for in terms of career development?
你在职业发展上寻求的是什么？
How do you want to improve yourself in the next year?
你希望在明年如何提升自我？
What kind of goals would you have in mind if you got this job?
如果你得到这份工作，你有什么样的目标？
If I were to ask your last supervisor to provide you additional training or exposure, what would she suggest?
如果我让你以前的主管透露一些你需要提升的地方，她会怎么说？****
Getting started questions:
入门问题
How would you go about establishing your credibility quickly with the team?
你会如何在新团队当中建立大家对你的信任感？
How long will it take for you to make a significant contribution?
要做出一次重大的贡献，你需要多长时间？
What do you see yourself doing within the first 30 days of this job?
开始这份工作的前三十天，你希望做些什么？
If selected for this position, can you describe your strategy for the first 90 days?
如果选择了这个职位，你能描述一下前九十天你的策略吗？**
More questions about you:
关于你自己的部分；**
How would you describe your work style?
你的工作风格如何？
What would be your ideal working environment?
你希望中的工作环境是怎么样的？
What do you look for in terms of culture -- structured or entrepreneurial?
在文化，组织构架以及创业精神上，你有什么样的追求？
If you had to choose one, would you consider yourself a big-picture person or a detail-oriented person?
你觉得自己是一个喜欢操纵大局的人还是专注细节的人？
Tell me about your proudest achievement.
你最为骄傲的成就是什么？
Who was your favorite manager and why?
谁是你最喜欢的管理者，为什么？
What do you think of your previous boss?
你觉得你的前任老板是什么样的人？
Was there a person in your career who really made a difference?
在你的职业生涯中，有没有一个人对你产生影响？
What kind of personality do you work best with and why?
你和什么性格的人一起工作最合适，为什么？
What are you most proud of?
你最引以为豪的事情是？
What do you like to do?
你喜欢做些什么？
What are your lifelong dreams?
你毕生的梦想是什么？
What do you ultimately want to become?
你最希望成为什么？
What is your personal mission statement?
你的个人宣言是什么？
What are three positive things your last boss would say about you?
你的前任老板会说哪三个你好的方面？
What negative thing would your last boss say about you?
你的前任老板会说你哪些方面不好？
What three character traits would your friends use to describe you?
你的朋友们会用哪三个性格特点来形容你？
What are three positive character traits you don't have?
哪三项积极向上的性格品质是你没有的？
If you were interviewing someone for this position, what traits would you look for?
如果你是面试官，对于前来应聘这个职位的人，你看重哪些品质？
List five words that describe your character.
用五个词来形容你的个性特点
Who has impacted you most in your career and how?
谁对你的职业生涯影响最大，如何影响的？
What is your greatest fear?
你最为担心的事情是什么？
What is your biggest regret and why?
你最大的遗憾是什么并描述为什么。
What's the most important thing you learned in school?
在学校你学到最重要的事情是什么？
Why did you choose your major?
为什么你选择了这个专业？
What will you miss about your present/last job?
你现在/过去的工作中，你最怀念的是什么？
What is your greatest achievement outside of work?
工作之外，你最大的成就是什么？
What are the qualities of a good leader?
一个好的领导者具有哪些品质特点？
A bad leader?
一个不称职的领导者呢？
Do you think a leader should be feared or liked?
你觉得领导者是应该受到员工的喜爱，还是被人畏惧？
How do you feel about taking no for an answer?
被人拒绝之后你有什么感想？
How do you think I rate as an interviewer?
你觉得我作为一个面试官表现如何？
Tell me one thing about yourself you wouldn't want me to know.
告诉我一件关于你自己，但是你不希望我知道的事情。
Tell me the difference between good and exceptional.
说一说好和例外之间的区别。
What kind of car do you drive?
你开什么车？
There's no right or wrong answer, but if you could be anywhere in the world right now, where would you be?
这个问题没有对错之分，如果你现在能到世界上任何一个地方，你最想在哪？
What's the last book you read?
你上一次阅读的书籍是什么？
What magazines do you subscribe to?
你订阅了什么杂志？
What's the best movie you've seen in the last year?
去年你看过最好的电影是什么？
What would you do if you won the lottery?
如果你中了彩票你会做些什么？
Who are your heroes?
谁是你心目中的英雄？
What do you like to do for fun?
消遣的时候你喜欢做什么？
What do you do in your spare time?
你业余时间会做些什么？
What is your favorite memory from childhood?
从童年起，你最美好的记忆是什么？
Brainteasers:
智力问题
How many times do a clock's hands overlap in a day?
一天当中，时钟的指针会重叠几次？
How would you weigh a plane without scales?
没有称你怎样测量飞机的重量？
Tell me 10 ways to use a pencil other than writing.
说出使用铅笔除了写字以外的十种方法。
Sell me this pencil.
向我推销这支铅笔。
If you were an animal, which one would you want to be?
假如你是动物，你希望成为哪一种？
Why is there fuzz on a tennis ball?
为什么网球上面会有绒毛？
If you could choose one superhero power, what would it be and why?
如果你能够选择一项超人能力，你会选择什么，为什么？
If you could get rid of any one of the US states, which one would you get rid of and why?
假设你能摆脱美国的任何一个人，你希望摆脱谁，为什么？
With your eyes closed, tell me step-by-step how to tie my shoes.
闭上眼睛，告诉我该如何一步一步的系上我的鞋带。
